text_block_list.text: The day after our date, Mayano Top Gun was hard at work training.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Whew～, I'm done with the menu～……
choice_data_list: Good job! Let's take a break.
Good job! Let's take a break.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm… uhmm. Maya can still keep going. 
Give me the next menu!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……training is still boring and makes me think, 
'Is there a point to this?' but…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I've decided to do my best if you say so! 
Okay-, next!!

The menu was to steadily work on stamina, but Mayano Top Gun 
persevered and did her best.
After days of training like this―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh my gosh! 
Hurry-hurry-hurry, come with Maya now!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
You know what, you won't believe this～…… 
Maya is going to run in a mock race-!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
She said, 
'You've been working hard lately, so you can race'!!.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, yeah. 
…It's all thanks to you.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey, come watch Maya race! I'll go ahead and get ready. 
Just make sure you come! It's a promise!!
It's decided that I was going to watch her race.

She seemed to be very enthusiastic, 
I wonder what kind of race she will show us……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's Brian-san! Are you going to run in the mock race? 
You're going to run with Maya? Yes～!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: What's up, you're quite a noisy one……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, it's because I'm so happy right now♪ 
…Oh, ah-! You came!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yes♪ I'm feeling really good today.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
How should I put it…… I have a feeling that 
today is going to be so much fun!

This should be the first time 
Maya trained for a race.

Mayano Top Gun has always had an overwhelming 'sense' 
of racing, and has always been able to find the "right 
answer" to match the battle conditions.
And now, having gone through a training―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……Oh, looks like it's about to start! Okay, I'm off. Don't let 
Maya out of your sight♪

In the race that began, Narita Brian 
was in control of the race at the start.

Halfway through the race, Mayano Top Gun tried to pass 
Narita Brian at the right moment, but―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ah…… right here!! 
I'm going to make my move―

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ……Get out of my way

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Whaaaat!? Impossible…… 
I thought I got this……!
Contrary to what Maya had planned, she fell back……
After all, Narita Brian was not an easy opponent to catch up with.
But Mayano Top Gun didn't stop there……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ……Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
(What is this strange… feeling. Even though 
"I get it." It didn't work earlier……)

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
(I still feel 'I got this'…… 
I learned something new……!)

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
(My legs are still moving! 
I will continue on learning! I can do more!)

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ―Right now!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hm……!

With a spectacular run through the pack, Mayano Top Gun sprints 
toward Narita Brian!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Maya-Chin, Take-oooooooooff!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Ha…… Interesting!!
In the end, she could not catch up to Narita Brian.

But Mayano Top Gun's final push was 
well deserved to be praised……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ha, haa…… 
Haaaa～, I lost～!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But…… that was awesome. 
I really, really enjoyed it!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Because it was my first time! I learned 
something new during the race!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
And yet, I could not catch up to Brian-san, 
and there are more things I don't understand now……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But that made it all the more exciting! The race, which was fun 
to begin with, just got a whole lot more fun……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
You know…… is it because, 
because I trained?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
To learn something new…… Is that 
the point of training?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ……I see. I still hate boring things, but…… they do make sense.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Then Maya, will do her best if it's with you! 
Even if it's boring, I can put up with it.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
So, uhmm…… 
will you continue to be with Maya?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Maya, promise that she'll become a sparkling adult Uma Musume, so 
watch out for Maya!
choice_data_list: Of course! Please allow me to scout you
Of course! Please allow me to scout you!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Wa… really!? Really really!? 
You can't say no now!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yaaaaaay!!!! 
Please take care of me, trainer-chan!

Thus began the days with Mayano Top Gun, a little genius with 
unlimited potential―!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Mayano Top Gun, huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll remember…
